attributes.action: Paying car tax with monthly payments
attributes.additional_details:
Have you ever thought about how life would be financially easier if you could pay for your car tax through monthly Direct Debit payments?

I certainly have!

I can pay for ALL of my household bills by monthly Direct Debit payments and yet I can't with my car tax.  With the increasing financial costs that we are all struggling with, I feel that this is a way forward that the Government should consider to support families at this difficult time.

I hope you agree!
